column1: Local Foods////We live close by in West U
column2: and my family and I have been here maybe 100 times in the past year. They have very good quality food
column3: NOT greasy in the least bit
column4: everything is healthy here and very well priced. Staff are nice and responsive
column5: restaurant is kept very clean and tidy. Highly Recommend them... Especially the Crunchy Chicken Sandwich!!
